name: Electronics
description: Offers a wide range of electronic devices such as computers, mobile devices, home appliances, audio and video equipment, with prices ranging from affordable options to high-end models.

name: Fashion and Clothing
description: Provides a variety of fashionable clothing items, including apparel, footwear, accessories, and jewelry, catering to different styles and budgets.

name: Home and Garden
description: Offers a selection of furniture, interior goods, kitchenware, gardening tools, and decor items to enhance the aesthetics and functionality of your home, with prices varying based on the specific items.

name: Beauty and Health
description: Provides cosmetics, skincare and haircare products, perfumes, vitamins, supplements, and other health-related goods to help individuals look and feel their best, with prices ranging from budget-friendly to luxury options.

name: Sports and Fitness
description: Offers sports apparel, equipment, and accessories for various sports and fitness activities, catering to both casual enthusiasts and professional athletes, with prices reflecting the quality and brand of the items.

name: Kids and Toys
description: Features a range of products for children of different ages, including toys, clothing, footwear, and baby care items, with prices varying based on the type and brand of the product.

name: Books and Entertainment
description: Offers a wide selection of books, magazines, movies, music, video games, and board games to entertain and educate, with prices varying depending on the format and popularity of the content.

name: Travel and Tourism
description: Provides services and products related to travel, including hotel bookings, flights, vacation packages, car rentals, and other travel-related goods, with prices depending on the destination and the type of service or package chosen.

name: Food and Beverages
description: Offers a variety of food products, beverages, delicacies, snacks, and even prepared meals, with prices ranging from budget-friendly options to gourmet or specialty items.

name: Repair and Construction
description: Provides materials, tools, and products for repairs and construction projects, catering to DIY enthusiasts or professionals, with prices varying based on the specific items and their quality.
